# Páramo AI — Full Documentation

> OpenClaw Implementation Studio. We show you what's possible, then we build it.

## About

Páramo AI is an AI-native company that builds custom AI automation for business owners using OpenClaw. Named after the páramo — the high-altitude ecosystem of the Andes — we operate at elevation so your business flows effortlessly downstream.

## Services

### OpenClaw Setup — $500

Your own AI assistant, fully set up and ready to go.

- We set it up for you — no coding required
- Runs 24/7 on a virtual server
- Control it from any messenger (Slack, WhatsApp, Telegram, Discord, Signal, iMessage)
- 10 skills pre-installed
- Ongoing support if you get stuck

### Summit — Custom Pricing

Full-stack AI infrastructure for businesses ready to go all-in on automation.

- Unlimited automations
- Dedicated automation lead
- Custom AI agent development
- Integration architecture connecting your entire stack (CRM, email, payments, scheduling, content)
- White-glove onboarding

## What We Build

### AI Command Centers
A single dashboard managing multiple AI instances. Monitor, control, and optimize all your automations from one place.

### Workflow Automation
End-to-end systems that handle content creation, lead nurturing, customer onboarding, and operations — without you touching a thing.

### Custom AI Agents
Purpose-built agents trained on your business data. They think like you, respond like you, and work around the clock.

### Data Pipelines
Automated collection, processing, and reporting. Turn raw data from scattered sources into actionable dashboards.

### Smart Outreach Systems
Personalized, AI-driven email and DM sequences that sound like you wrote them — because we trained the AI on your voice.

### Integration Architecture
We connect your entire stack — CRM, email, payments, scheduling, content — into one cohesive, automated ecosystem.

## Process

1. **Discovery Call** — We map your current workflows and identify the highest-leverage automation opportunities in your business.
2. **We Build It** — Our team designs, builds, and tests your custom automation. You see demos at every stage — proof, not promises.
3. **You Grow** — We deploy, train your team, and provide ongoing support. The system runs. You get your time back.

## Results

- 120+ automations deployed
- 40 hours saved per client per month
- 5 AI instances managed from one dashboard
- 98% client retention
